title: Punisher: The Movie (Trade Paperback)
description:
Presenting the official comic book adaptation of Marvel’s 2004 blockbuster motion picture – starring John Travolta, Thomas Jane and Rebecca Romjin-Stamos. Frank Castle is an undercover government special agent pushed over the edge when his family is executed. Left for dead, Castle is reborn with one all-consuming mission – to PUNISH the murderers!
Also collected in this volume: the VERY FIRST appearance of the Punisher, and writer Garth Ennis’ first Punisher story!
Collects PUNISHER: THE MOVIE ADAPTATION #1-3, AMAZING SPIDER-MAN #129, PUNISHER Vol. 3, #1!
